why: You respect and value me
You can always make me smile or laugh, even when I'm mad at you
Your silliness
You have a great mind that is going to change the world one day
I still get butterflies when you look at me
I feel safe and loved when I am with you
You bring so much joy and happieness into my life
You are creative
We can talk for hours and hours about almost anything without running out of things to say
You hold things together when I feel like they are falling apart
I feel at home with you
You are brave and encourage me to be braver
You are loyal to your friends
You are generous
You push me to be the best version of myself
You see the potential in people, and want to help them achieve it
You are super cute
When we touch it's like magic, and I never want it to stop
We have great communcation
You have always been so sure of us, and make me feel secure
You still think I'm cute even though you've seen me at my grossest
You are adaptable to all kinds of crazy situations
We are an unstoppable team together
We may actually be perfect for eachother
